txt.en: You should burn the tents of the Orcs at Maustazg
While patrolling the Entwash Vale for Góda, the opportunity presented itself for you to sow mayhem at the Orc-camp of Maustazg.
While patrolling the Entwash Vale for Góda, an opportunity presented itself for you to sow mayhem at the Orc-camp of Maustazg.\n\nYou should burn tents at Maustazg.
Orc-tents can be found at Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to sow mayhem among the Orcs by burning their tents.

'Mayhem? I daresay! Your act will bring the full wrath of the Orcs down upon us, and perhaps sooner than expected!\n\n'Be careful of your actions, [placeholder], for they may put you in a position you do not want to be in....'
Orc-tents can be found at Maustazg, east of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to sow mayhem among the Orcs by burning their tents.
Góda is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, west of Maustazg.\n\nYou should return to Góda and let her know what you have done.
Talk to Góda in the Mead Hall of Eaworth
